TEXT: The Showman. An entertainer who views the world as their stage.
NL You chuck a fistful of cards at the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~performer,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
NL You turn the heart into a Byrd and chuck a fistful of cards at it.
